captions.text: And I'm not your bra.
[ crowd murmuring ]

Whatever, dude.  Whatever.
Peace.  God bless.

Hey, hansel, I'm really sorry
you didn't get mugatu's
derelicte campaign.

- Maybe next time.
- What's that ?

Mugatu's derelicte campaign.
Sorry you didn't book it.

Oh, yeah ?
I've never even heard of it.

Me and my friends
have been too busy bathing
off the coast of st. Barts.

Tripping on acid changed
our whole perspective on shit.
So I guess, uh--

I guess you can "dere-lick"
my balls, <i>capitan.</i>

- [ crowd murmuring ]
- would you hold this ?

I can "dere-lick" my own balls,
thank you very much.
Ohh !

You think you're
too cool for school.

But I got a news flash for you,
walter cronkite.
You aren't.

Who are you trying
to get crazy with, <i>ese</i> ?
Don't you know I'm loco ?
Hey, I got a wacky idea.

What say we settle this
on the runway...
Han-solo ?
Whoo.  Whoo.
Whoo-whoo-whoo-whoo.
Stop it.

Are you challenging me
to a walk-off ?
Boo-lander.
Don't do this, derek.

Listen to your friend
billy zane.

He's a cool dude.  He's
trying to help you out.

title: Zoolander (6/10) Movie CLIP - I'm Not Your Brah (2001) HD

comments.text:
This scene truly shows acting at its finest. You can, certainly, sense the 
passion and the emotion that is emitting from this scene. This movie is a 
masterpiece in general. I was disappointed that the Academy didn't realize 
how good this movie was. Ben Stiller is truly an amazing actor, and the 
same goes for Owen. This movie is a classic. One for the books.﻿
